question: Which of the following is the main objective of the Kaushal Satrang Scheme of Uttar Pradesh?
option3: Skill development and Creating Job opportunities
option4: Providing jobs to unemployed youth under MGNREGS
answer: Skill development and Creating Job opportunities
explanation: The main objective of the Kaushal Satrang Scheme of Uttar Pradesh is to provide skill development programmes and Creating Job opportunities to the unemployed youth of Uttar Pradesh. The training will be provided to 2.37 Lakh people. Each district of UP will also organize the Mega job fair event.
